Prefect Karukia:
We Atuka Orcs are the Scepter of the Wolf! The Wolf is our brother and our guardian, and has been the symbol of our tribe for a long time.
The other Orc tribes also have unique symbols. The Hestui tribe bear the symbol of the Bear, the Neruga tribe bear the symbol of the Bat, the Urutu tribe bear the symbol of the Orc Skull, the Duda-mara bear the symbol of the Spider, and the Gandi tribe bear the symbol of the Leopard.
